As a consequence, large ion populations can be accommodated within the extended two-dimensional hydrogen-bond network at the interface, causing only minor local distortions but significant changes to its longer-range connectivity. These results reveal a distinct mechanism of electrolyte organization at aqueous-carbon interfaces, relevant to energy applications, where performance is highly sensitive to the local organization of interfacial water.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过结合振动和频光谱与机器学习分子动力学模拟，挑战了传统认为疏水固体-水界面与空气-水界面行为相似的假设，揭示了石墨烯-NaCl溶液界面独特的离子吸附机制。
AI.motivation: 传统上认为疏水固体-水界面的微观行为与空气-水界面相似，但这一假设缺乏直接验证。研究旨在探究石墨烯-NaCl溶液界面的离子吸附机制，挑战现有范式。
AI.method: 结合异差检测振动和频光谱与基于第一性原理精度的机器学习分子动力学模拟，研究石墨烯-NaCl溶液界面。
AI.result: 光谱显示离子对界面水结构影响很小，但模拟显示Na+和Cl-在界面大量积累。这种吸附机制与空气-水界面不同，离子无法穿透固体边界，与界面水分子处于相似深度，在扩展的二维氢键网络中引起局部微小畸变但显著改变长程连接性。
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了水-碳界面电解质组织的独特机制，这对能量应用具有重要意义，因为性能对界面水的局部组织高度敏感。

title: Tunable Luttinger liquid and correlated insulating states in one-dimensional moiré superlattices
summary: Two-dimensional moiré superlattices have been extensively studied, and a variety of correlated phenomena have been observed. However, their lower-dimensional counterpart, one-dimensional (1D) moiré superlattices, remain largely unexplored. Electrons in 1D are generally described by Luttinger liquid theory, with universal scaling relations depending only on the Luttinger parameter g. In particular, at half-filling, Umklapp scattering plays a crucial role, as it can significantly change the conductance-temperature scaling relation and lead to Mott insulators. However, this prediction has never been observed since doping an empty band to half-filling was extremely difficult. Here, we show that the marriage of moiré superlattices and 1D electrons makes it possible to study the Luttinger liquid in an exceptionally wide filling region simply by electrical gating. We perform transport measurements on 1D moiré superlattices of carbon nanotubes on hexagonal boron nitride (hBN) substrates, and observe correlated insulating states at 1/4 and 1/2 fillings of the superlattice mini-band, where Umklapp scattering becomes dominant. We also observe a T-linear conductance at these commensurate fillings over a range of temperatures. Strikingly, the T-linear conductance leads to a strongly suppressed Luttinger parameter, suggesting a state of extreme correlation.

AI.tldr: 该研究首次在碳纳米管/六方氮化硼一维莫尔超晶格中观察到1/4和1/2填充时的关联绝缘态，验证了Luttinger液体理论中Umklapp散射在特定填充下的关键作用。
AI.motivation: 一维莫尔超晶格研究相对较少，而一维电子系统通常用Luttinger液体理论描述。在1/2填充时Umklapp散射会显著改变电导-温度标度关系并导致Mott绝缘体，但这一预测从未被观察到，因为将空带掺杂到1/2填充极其困难。
AI.method: 通过在六方氮化硼衬底上构建碳纳米管一维莫尔超晶格，通过电门控简单调节填充度，并进行输运测量。
AI.result: 在超晶格微带的1/4和1/2填充处观察到关联绝缘态，此时Umklapp散射占主导。在这些特定填充处观察到T线性电导，导致Luttinger参数被强烈抑制，表明极端关联状态。
AI.conclusion: 莫尔超晶格与一维电子的结合使得能够在极宽填充区域内研究Luttinger液体，验证了理论预测的Umklapp散射效应，并揭示了极端关联状态。

title: Equivariant Atomic and Lattice Modeling Using Geometric Deep Learning for Crystal Structure Optimization
summary: Structure optimization, which yields the relaxed structure (minimum-energy state), is essential for reliable materials property calculations, yet traditional ab initio approaches such as density-functional theory (DFT) are computationally intensive. Machine learning (ML) has emerged to alleviate this bottleneck but suffers from two major limitations: (i) existing models operate mainly on atoms, leaving lattice vectors implicit despite their critical role in structural optimization; and (ii) they often rely on multi-stage, non-end-to-end workflows that are prone to error accumulation. Here, we present E3Relax, an end-to-end equivariant graph neural network that maps an unrelaxed crystal directly to its relaxed structure. E3Relax promotes both atoms and lattice vectors to graph nodes endowed with dual scalar-vector features, enabling unified and symmetry-preserving modeling of atomic displacements and lattice deformations. A layer-wise supervision strategy forces every network depth to make a physically meaningful refinement, mimicking the incremental convergence of DFT while preserving a fully end-to-end pipeline. We evaluate E3Relax on four benchmark datasets and demonstrate that it achieves remarkable accuracy and efficiency. Through DFT validations, we show that the structures predicted by E3Relax are energetically favorable, making them suitable as high-quality initial configurations to accelerate DFT calculations.

AI.tldr: E3Relax是一个端到端的等变图神经网络，可直接将未松弛晶体映射到其松弛结构，统一处理原子位移和晶格变形，显著提高结构优化的效率和准确性。
AI.motivation: 传统DFT方法计算成本高，现有机器学习方法存在两个主要局限：(i)主要处理原子而忽略晶格向量的显式建模；(ii)多阶段非端到端工作流程容易产生误差累积。
AI.method: 提出E3Relax模型，将原子和晶格向量都提升为具有双标量-向量特征的图节点，采用层间监督策略强制每个网络深度进行物理上有意义的细化。
AI.result: 在四个基准数据集上评估显示，E3Relax实现了显著的准确性和效率，DFT验证表明其预测的结构在能量上更有利。
AI.conclusion: E3Relax能够生成高质量的初始配置，可有效加速DFT计算，为材料结构优化提供了高效的端到端解决方案。

title: Thermodynamic integration, fermion sign problem, and real-space renormalization
summary: We reconsider real-space renormalization for the two-dimensional Ising model, following the path traced out by Wilson in Sect. VI of his 1975 Reviews of Modern Physics. In that reference, Wilson considerably extended the Kadanoff decimation procedure towards a possibly rigorous construction of a real-space scale-invariant hamiltonian. Wilson's construction has, to the best of our knowledge, never been fully understood and thus neither reproduced nor generalized. In the present work, we use Monte Carlo sampling in combination with thermodynamic integration in order to retrace Wilson's computation for a real-space renormalization with a number of terms in the hamiltonian. We elaborate on the connection of real-space renormalization with the fermion sign problem and discuss to which extent our Monte Carlo procedure actually implements Wilson's program from half a century ago.

AI.tldr: 本文重新研究了二维Ising模型的实空间重整化，通过蒙特卡洛采样和热力学积分重现了Wilson在1975年提出的计算，探讨了实空间重整化与费米子符号问题的联系。
AI.motivation: Wilson在1975年提出的实空间重整化构造方法从未被完全理解和重现，本文旨在重现Wilson的计算并探讨其与费米子符号问题的联系。
AI.method: 使用蒙特卡洛采样结合热力学积分方法，在实空间重整化中处理包含多个项的哈密顿量。
AI.result: 成功重现了Wilson半个世纪前的计算程序，实现了实空间重整化的数值实现。
AI.conclusion: 本文通过数值方法验证了Wilson的实空间重整化方案，并建立了与费米子符号问题的理论联系。

title: Deterministic Switching of Perpendicular Ferromagnets by Higher-order Spin-orbit Torque in Noncentrosymmetric Weyl Semimetals
summary: Field-free deterministic switching of perpendicular ferromagnets is a central challenge for spintronics applications, typically requiring explicit symmetry breaking. Here we show that deterministic switching can instead be achieved through higher-order (in magnetization angles) spin-orbit torques, even in systems that preserve in-plane mirror symmetry. Using a vector spherical harmonics expansion, we demonstrate that higher-order torque terms naturally give rise to additional out-of-equator fixed points, enabling reliable magnetization reversal when their magnitude is comparable to conventional lowest-order torques. We illustrate this mechanism with first-principles calculations on the noncentrosymmetric Weyl ferromagnet PrAlGe, where the combination of Weyl-node band topology and strong spin-orbit coupling produces sizable higher-order torque components. Because the Fermi surface is small, the conventional lowest-order torques are relatively weak, allowing the higher-order harmonics to compete on equal footing and strongly reshape the magnetization dynamics. The resulting spin dynamics confirm deterministic switching without additional symmetry breaking. Our results establish higher-order spin-orbit torque as a key ingredient for understanding and controlling magnetization dynamics in topological and spintronic materials.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种无需外场即可确定性翻转垂直铁磁体的新机制，通过高阶自旋轨道力矩实现，即使在保持面内镜像对称的系统中也能工作。
AI.motivation: 传统上，垂直铁磁体的确定性翻转需要显式对称性破缺，这限制了应用。本文旨在探索在保持对称性的系统中实现确定性翻转的新途径。
AI.method: 使用矢量球谐函数展开分析高阶自旋轨道力矩，通过第一性原理计算研究非中心对称Weyl铁磁体PrAlGe中的自旋动力学。
AI.result: 高阶力矩项产生额外的赤道外固定点，当它们的大小与传统最低阶力矩相当时，能够实现可靠的磁化翻转。PrAlGe中的Weyl节点能带拓扑和强自旋轨道耦合产生了显著的高阶力矩分量。
AI.conclusion: 高阶自旋轨道力矩是理解和控制拓扑与自旋电子材料中磁化动力学的关键因素，为无外场确定性翻转提供了新机制。

title: Tuning of Weyl point emergence in multi-terminal Josephson junctions using quantum point contacts
summary: Multi-terminal Josephson junction with three or more superconductors is an attractive quantum system to emerge and tune exotic electronic states. In four terminal Josephson junctions, the Weyl physics, namely topologically protected zero energy state, emerges without assuming any exotic materials. In this study, we consider the four-terminal Josephson junction with the quantum point contact structures between the mesoscopic normal region and four superconducting terminals. The quantum point contacts can tune electrically the number of conduction channels. We theoretically investigate an effect of the increase of channels on the emergence of Weyl points. The increase of channels causes the increase of Andreev bound states in the system, which increase the emergence probability of Weyl points. When all terminals have two channels, the emergence probability is up to 17\%, which is about four times larger than that for all single channel junctions. We consider the balance of the number of conduction channels in the four terminals. When the number of channels is unbalanced, the increase of emergence probability is suppressed.

AI.tldr: 研究四端约瑟夫森结中通过增加量子点接触的传导通道数来增强Weyl点（拓扑保护零能态）出现概率的理论分析。
AI.motivation: 多端约瑟夫森结是产生和调控奇异电子态的有前景量子系统，四端结构中无需特殊材料即可实现Weyl物理。研究旨在探索如何通过调控传导通道数来增强拓扑保护态的出现概率。
AI.method: 理论分析四端约瑟夫森结，在介观正常区域与四个超导终端之间设置量子点接触结构，通过电调控传导通道数量，研究通道数增加对Weyl点出现的影响。
AI.result: 通道数增加导致系统中Andreev束缚态增加，从而提高了Weyl点出现概率。当所有终端都有两个通道时，出现概率达17%，比单通道情况提高约四倍。通道数不平衡会抑制概率增加。
AI.conclusion: 通过增加量子点接触的传导通道数可以有效增强四端约瑟夫森结中拓扑保护Weyl点的出现概率，但需要保持各终端通道数的平衡以获得最佳效果。

title: A Hybrid Physics-Driven Neural Network Force Field for Liquid Electrolytes
summary: Electrolyte design plays an important role in the development of lithium-ion batteries and sodium-ion batteries. Battery electrolytes feature a large design space composed of different solvents, additives, and salts, which is difficult to explore experimentally. High-fidelity molecular simulation can accurately predict the bulk properties of electrolytes by employing accurate potential energy surfaces, thus guiding the molecule and formula engineering. At present, the overly simplified classic force fields rely heavily on experimental data for fine-tuning, thus its predictive power on microscopic level is under question. In contrast, the newly emerged machine learning interatomic potential (MLIP) can accurately reproduce the ab initio data, demonstrating excellent fitting ability. However, it is still haunted by problems such as low transferrability, insufficient stability in the prediction of bulk properties, and poor training cost scaling. Therefore, it cannot yet be used as a robust and universal tool for the exploration of electrolyte design space. In this work, we introduce a highly scalable and fully bottom-up force field construction strategy called PhyNEO-Electrolyte. It adopts a hybrid physics-driven and data-driven method that relies only on monomer and dimer EDA (energy deomposition analysis) data. With a careful separation of long/short-range and non-bonding/bonding interactions, we rigorously restore the long-range asymptotic behavior, which is critical in the description of electrolyte systems. Through this approach, we significantly improve the data efficiency of MLIP training, allowing us to achieve much larger chemical space coverage using much less data while retaining reliable quantitative prediction power in bulk phase calculations. PhyNEO-electrolyte thus serves as an important tool for future electrolyte optimization.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为PhyNEO-Electrolyte的可扩展力场构建策略，通过混合物理驱动和数据驱动方法，仅使用单体和二聚体能量分解分析数据，显著提高了机器学习原子间势的训练数据效率，为电解质设计空间探索提供了重要工具。
AI.motivation: 传统力场依赖实验数据微调，预测能力有限；机器学习原子间势虽然能准确复现从头算数据，但存在迁移性差、稳定性不足和训练成本高等问题，无法作为电解质设计空间探索的稳健通用工具。
AI.method: 采用混合物理驱动和数据驱动方法，仅依赖单体和二聚体能量分解分析数据，通过仔细分离长/短程和非键合/键合相互作用，严格恢复长程渐近行为。
AI.result: 显著提高了机器学习原子间势训练的数据效率，使用更少数据实现了更大的化学空间覆盖，同时在体相计算中保持了可靠的定量预测能力。
AI.conclusion: PhyNEO-electrolyte可作为未来电解质优化的重要工具。

title: Reinforcement Learning for Chemical Ordering in Alloy Nanoparticles
summary: We approach the search for optimal element ordering in bimetallic alloy nanoparticles (NPs) as a reinforcement learning (RL) problem, and have built an RL agent that learns to perform such global optimisation using the geometric graph representation of the NPs. To demonstrate the effectiveness, we train an RL agent to perform composition-conserving atomic swap actions on the icosahedral nanoparticle structure. Trained once on randomised $Ag_{X}Au_{309-X}$ compositions and orderings, the agent discovers previously established ground state structure. We show that this optimization is robust to differently ordered initialisations of the same NP compositions. We also demonstrate that a trained policy can extrapolate effectively to NPs of unseen size. However, the efficacy is limited when multiple alloying elements are involved. Our results demonstrate that RL with pre-trained equivariant graph encodings can navigate combinatorial ordering spaces at the nanoparticle scale, and offer a transferable optimisation strategy with the potential to generalise across composition and reduce repeated individual search cost.

AI.tldr: 使用强化学习优化双金属合金纳米颗粒的元素排序，通过几何图表示训练RL代理执行原子交换操作，发现已知基态结构，并能推广到未见尺寸的纳米颗粒。
AI.motivation: 解决双金属合金纳米颗粒中元素排序的全局优化问题，传统方法在组合空间中搜索成本高，需要可推广的优化策略。
AI.method: 构建强化学习代理，使用几何图表示纳米颗粒，训练代理在二十面体纳米颗粒上执行成分守恒的原子交换操作。
AI.result: 代理在随机初始化的AgAu合金中发现了已知基态结构，优化对相同成分的不同初始排序具有鲁棒性，训练后的策略能有效推广到未见尺寸的纳米颗粒，但在多合金元素情况下效果有限。
AI.conclusion: 强化学习与预训练等变图编码能够导航纳米颗粒尺度的组合排序空间，提供可迁移的优化策略，具有跨成分泛化潜力并能减少重复搜索成本。

title: Quantifying and minimizing dissipation in a non-equilibrium phase transition
summary: In a finite-time continuous phase transition, topological defects emerge as the system undergoes spontaneous symmetry breaking. The Kibble-Zurek mechanism predicts how the defect density scales with the quench rate. During such processes, dissipation also arises as the system fails to adiabatically follow the control protocol near the critical point. Quantifying and minimizing this dissipation is fundamentally relevant to nonequilibrium thermodynamics and practically important for energy-efficient computing and devices. However, there are no prior experimental measurements of dissipation, or the optimization of control protocols to reduce it in many-body systems. In addition, it is an open question to what extent dissipation is correlated with the formation of defects. Here, we directly measure the dissipation generated during the voltage-driven Freedericksz transition of a liquid crystal with a sensitivity equivalent to a ~10 nanokelvin temperature rise. We observe Kibble-Zurek scaling of dissipation and its breakdown, both in quantitative agreement with existing theoretical works. We further implement a fully automated in-situ optimization approach that discovers more optimal driving protocols, reducing dissipation by a factor of three relative to a simple linear protocol.

AI.tldr: 本文通过实验测量液晶Freedericksz相变中的耗散，验证了Kibble-Zurek机制对耗散的标度律，并开发自动化优化方法将耗散减少三倍。
AI.motivation: 量化相变过程中的耗散对非平衡热力学和节能计算设备至关重要，但此前缺乏多体系统中耗散的实验测量和优化控制协议的研究。
AI.method: 使用电压驱动液晶Freedericksz相变，以相当于10纳开尔文温升的灵敏度直接测量耗散，并实施全自动原位优化方法寻找最优驱动协议。
AI.result: 观察到耗散的Kibble-Zurek标度律及其破缺，与理论预测定量一致；通过优化协议将耗散相对于简单线性协议减少三倍。
AI.conclusion: 首次实验验证了相变中耗散的Kibble-Zurek标度行为，并展示了通过优化控制协议显著降低耗散的可行性。

title: Topological Valley Transport in Bilayer Graphene Induced by Interlayer Sliding
summary: Interlayer sliding, together with twist angle, is a crucial parameter that defines the atomic registry and thus determines the properties of two-dimensional (2D) material homobilayers. Here, we theoretically demonstrate that controlled interlayer sliding in bilayer graphene induces Berry curvature reversals, leading to topological states confined within a one-dimensional moiré channel. We experimentally realize interlayer sliding by bending the bilayer graphene geometry across a nanoridge. Systematic electronic transport measurements reveal topological valley transport when the Fermi energy resides within the band gap, consistent with theoretical predictions of eight topological channels. Our findings establish interlayer sliding as a powerful tool for tuning the electronic properties of bilayer graphene and underscore its potential for broad application across 2D material systems.

AI.tldr: 通过控制双层石墨烯的层间滑动，在莫尔通道中诱导贝里曲率反转，实现一维拓扑态和谷输运。
AI.motivation: 层间滑动与扭转角一样是定义二维材料同质双层原子排列的关键参数，能够调控材料性质。
AI.method: 理论上分析层间滑动诱导的贝里曲率反转，实验上通过在纳米脊上弯曲双层石墨烯实现可控层间滑动，并进行系统电子输运测量。
AI.result: 实验观测到费米能级位于带隙内时的拓扑谷输运，与理论预测的八个拓扑通道一致。
AI.conclusion: 层间滑动是调控双层石墨烯电子性质的有效工具，在二维材料系统中具有广泛应用潜力。

title: Projection-based DMRG-in-DFT embedding corrected by non-additive exchange-correlation
summary: The projection-based wave function (WF)-in-DFT embedding enables an efficient description of both the energetics and properties of large and complex chemical systems, with accuracy exceeding that of pure DFT. Recently, we have proposed using the density matrix renormalization group (DMRG) as the WF method for molecules containing strongly correlated fragments [Beran, P. et al. J. Phys. Chem. Lett. 2023, 14, 3, 716-722]. In this work, we demonstrate that the accuracy of the DMRG-in-DFT approach is primarily limited by the approximate treatment of the coupling between the active component and its environment through nonadditive exchange-correlation functionals. To address this issue, we combine exact exchange to reduce the nonadditive exchange error with a multireference adiabatic connection (AC) scheme to recover nonadditive correlation. The performance of the improved DMRG-in-DFT embedding is illustrated on two prototypical strongly correlated systems: the dissociation of the H20 chain and the cleavage of a triple CN bond in propionitrile.

AI.tldr: 提出了改进的DMRG-in-DFT嵌入方法，通过结合精确交换和多参考绝热连接方案来减少非加性交换相关误差，提高了强关联系统的计算精度。
AI.motivation: DMRG-in-DFT方法的精度主要受到活性组分与环境之间耦合的近似处理限制，特别是通过非加性交换相关泛函的处理。
AI.method: 结合精确交换来减少非加性交换误差，并使用多参考绝热连接方案来恢复非加性关联。
AI.result: 在H20链解离和丙腈中三键CN断裂两个典型强关联系统上验证了改进方法的性能。
AI.conclusion: 改进的DMRG-in-DFT嵌入方法能够更准确地描述强关联系统的电子结构。

title: Giant number-parity effect and scalable spin squeezing in Luttinger liquids
summary: Finite-size quantum spin systems can be magnetized by the application of a symmetry-breaking field, but in general their symmetry is expected to be restored once the field is turned off adiabatically. Recently (F. Caleca et al., arXiv:2412.15493) we have shown that systems of half-integer spins with an odd number of sites and a parity-preserving Hamiltonian can retain a finite magnetization, hence exhibiting spontaneous symmetry breaking (SSB) at finite size. Here we generalize this phenomenon to spin chains whose low-energy physics (in zero field) realizes a Luttinger-liquid phase. We observe that odd-sized chains can exhibit a phenomenon of finite-size quasi-SSB, in which a net sub-extensive magnetization, $M \sim N^{1-1/(4K)}$ is retained, where $N$ is the number of sites and $K$ the Luttinger exponent. Interestingly, the states prepared by turning off the symmetry-breaking field quasi-adiabatically display scalable spin squeezing -- namely stronger the bigger the system -- regardless of the parity of $N$. The scaling of the squeezing parameter is dictated again by the Luttinger exponent, $ξ_R^2 \sim N^{-1+1/(2K)}$. This result shows that scalable quantum correlations with metrological significance, associated typically with high-dimensional systems, can be found as well in gapless one-dimensional ones; and they are a direct consequence of the critical nature of Luttinger liquids.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了奇数位点半整数自旋链在Luttinger液体相中的有限尺寸准自发对称性破缺现象，发现系统在对称性破坏场关闭后能保留亚扩展磁化，并产生可扩展的自旋压缩。
AI.motivation: 探索有限尺寸量子自旋系统中自发对称性破缺的可能性，特别是奇数位点半整数自旋系统在Luttinger液体相中的行为。
AI.method: 通过准绝热地关闭对称性破坏场，研究奇数尺寸自旋链的磁化保留和自旋压缩特性，分析Luttinger指数对系统行为的影响。
AI.result: 发现奇数尺寸链能保留亚扩展磁化M∼N^{1-1/(4K)}，并产生可扩展的自旋压缩ξ_R^2∼N^{-1+1/(2K)}，其中N为位点数，K为Luttinger指数。
AI.conclusion: 临界Luttinger液体的一维无隙系统也能产生具有计量学意义的可扩展量子关联，这是其临界性质直接导致的结果。

title: Stoichiometry and Phase Control in K$_{1-x}$CrSe$_2$ via Self-Flux Synthesis
summary: Layered delafossite-type magnetic materials, such as KCrSe$_2$, are promising platforms for studying magnetic systems and potential frustration on triangular lattices. Synthesis, structure-type control, and off-stoichiometries remain major challenges in the investigation of these delafossite-type magnets. Starting from the same self-flux composition (K:Cr:Se = 8:1:8), we isolated three distinct K$_{1-x}$CrSe$_2$ phases with $x$ = 0, 0.13--0.17, and 0.32--0.35, each adopting a different structure type depending on the quenching temperature applied. The phase evolution indicates a sequence of transformations during synthesis between compounds with varying degrees of potassium deficiency. Building on these insights into phase stability and crystal growth, we successfully grew single crystals of full-stoichiometric KCrSe$_2$ -- enabling direction-dependent magnetization measurements. These measurements reveal a pronounced field dependence of the Néel temperature at low external fields, as well as a weak metamagnetic transition. Our findings demonstrate that even a simple parameter -- such as quenching temperature -- can be used to control stoichiometry, direct phase formation, and ultimately tune the magnetic properties of delafossite-type materials.

AI.tldr: 通过控制淬火温度，成功分离出三种不同钾缺陷程度的K1-xCrSe2相，并生长出单晶KCrSe2，揭示了其磁性的场依赖性和弱变磁转变。
AI.motivation: 研究层状delafossite型磁性材料KCrSe2在三角晶格上的磁性和潜在挫败，解决合成、结构控制和化学计量偏离等挑战。
AI.method: 使用相同的自熔剂组成，通过不同淬火温度控制相形成，分离出三种不同钾缺陷程度的相，并成功生长单晶进行磁化测量。
AI.result: 获得了三种不同钾缺陷程度的K1-xCrSe2相（x=0, 0.13-0.17, 0.32-0.35），单晶测量显示奈尔温度在低外场下具有显著场依赖性，并观察到弱变磁转变。
AI.conclusion: 淬火温度这一简单参数可用于控制化学计量、指导相形成，并最终调控delafossite型材料的磁性质。

title: Floquet Superheating
summary: Periodically driven many-body systems generally heat towards a featureless 'infinite-temperature' state. As an alternative to uniform heating in a clean system, here we establish a Floquet superheating regime, where fast heating nucleates at ''hot spots" generated by rare fluctuations in the local energy with respect to an appropriate effective Hamiltonian. Striking macroscopic consequences include exceptionally long-lived prethermalization and non-ergodic bimodal distributions of macroscopic observables. Superheating is predicated on a heating rate depending strongly on the local fluctuation; in our example, this is supplied by a sharp state-selective spin-echo, where the energy absorption is strongly suppressed for low-energy states, while thermal fluctuations open up excessive heating channels. A simple phenomenological theory is developed to show the existence of a critical droplet size, which incorporates heating by the driving field as well as the heat current out of the droplet. Our results shine light on a new heating mechanism and suggest new routes towards stabilizing non-equilibrium phases of matter in driven systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种Floquet超加热机制，其中快速加热从局部能量波动产生的"热点"处成核，导致长寿命预热化和非遍历双峰分布。
AI.motivation: 周期性驱动的多体系统通常会加热到无特征的"无限温度"状态，本文旨在探索一种替代均匀加热的新加热机制。
AI.method: 使用状态选择性自旋回波技术，其中低能态的能量吸收被强烈抑制，而热波动则打开过度的加热通道。建立了包含加热场加热和热流流出的临界液滴尺寸现象学理论。
AI.result: 发现了超加热机制，导致异常长寿命的预热化和宏观可观测量呈现非遍历双峰分布。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果揭示了新的加热机制，为稳定驱动系统中的非平衡物质相提供了新途径。

title: Electron Tunneling Enhances Thermal Conductance through Metal-Insulator-Semiconductor Junctions
summary: The presence of interfaces in semiconductor devices substantially hinders thermal transport, contributing disproportionately to the overall thermal resistance. However, approaches to enhance interfacial thermal transport remain scarce without changing the interface structure, as the intrinsic electron and phonon properties of constituent materials set an upper limit. Here, we find a new thermal transport pathway, electronic heat tunneling, to enhance interfacial thermal conductance through metal-insulator-semiconductor junctions. By applying photoexcitation or bias voltage, we observe remarkable thermal conductance increases in operando, opening a new channel for efficient interfacial heat dissipation. The electron quantum tunneling pathway is parallel to conventional phonon-mediated interfacial thermal transport, and violates the Wiedemann-Franz law since this pathway deviates from the paradigm of diffusive transport. Moreover, we develop a tunneling mismatch model to describe the enhanced thermal conductance, originating from tunneling heat flux. Our Letter demonstrates a previously unexplored heat transport mechanism to enhance thermal conductance, bypassing the need for interface engineering. These findings emphasize the essential need to understand semiconductor thermal properties under realistic operating conditions.

AI.tldr: 发现电子热隧穿新机制，通过金属-绝缘体-半导体结增强界面热导，无需改变界面结构即可显著提升散热效率
AI.motivation: 半导体器件中的界面严重阻碍热传输，但传统方法难以在不改变界面结构的情况下突破材料本征电子和声子特性的限制
AI.method: 在金属-绝缘体-半导体结中应用光激发或偏置电压，观察操作中的热导变化，并开发隧穿失配模型描述增强的热导
AI.result: 观察到显著的热导增加，电子量子隧穿通道与传统声子介导的热传输并行，且违反维德曼-弗朗兹定律
AI.conclusion: 证明了无需界面工程即可增强热导的新热传输机制，强调需要在实际工作条件下理解半导体热特性

title: An Automated Framework for Analyzing Structural Evolution in On-the-fly Non-adiabatic Molecular Dynamics Using Autoencoder and Multiple Molecular Descriptors
summary: A major challenge in nonadiabatic molecular dynamics is to automatically and objectively identify the key reaction coordinates that drive molecules toward distinct excited-state decay channels. Traditional manual analyses are inefficient and rely heavily on expert intuition, creating a bottleneck for interpreting complex photochemical processes. To overcome this, we introduce a fully automated machine-learning framework that directly extracts these coordinates from on-the-fly trajectory surface hopping data. By combining an Autoencoder for nonlinear dimensionality reduction with clustering and information entropy analysis, our method autonomously maps reaction channels and pinpoints their governing structural motions. When applied to keto isocytosine and the methaniminium cation, the framework objectively revealed invovled reaction channels and corresponding active coordinates with high efficiency and accuracy. This work establishes an effective paradigm for mechanistic insight in excited-state dynamics, transforming raw trajectory data into clear, interpretable reaction mechanisms.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种全自动机器学习框架，用于从表面跳跃轨迹数据中自动识别驱动分子向不同激发态衰变通道的关键反应坐标。
AI.motivation: 传统的手动分析方法效率低下且依赖专家直觉，这成为解释复杂光化学过程的瓶颈。需要一种自动化和客观的方法来识别关键反应坐标。
AI.method: 结合自编码器进行非线性降维、聚类和信息熵分析，从表面跳跃轨迹数据中直接提取反应坐标。
AI.result: 应用于酮基异胞嘧啶和甲亚胺阳离子时，该框架高效准确地揭示了涉及的反应通道和相应的活性坐标。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为激发态动力学中的机理洞察建立了一个有效范式，将原始轨迹数据转化为清晰、可解释的反应机制。

title: Open-shell frozen natural orbital approach for quantum eigensolvers
summary: We present an open-shell frozen natural orbital (FNO) approach, which utilizes the second-order Z-averaged perturbation theory (ZAPT2), to reduce the restricted opten-shell Hartree-Fock virtual space size with controllable accuracy. Our ZAPT2 frozen natural orbital (ZAPT-FNO) selection scheme significantly outperforms the canonical molecular orbital virtual space truncation scheme based on Hartree-Fock orbital energies, especially when using large multiple-polarized and augmented basis sets. We demonstrate that the ZAPT-FNO-selected virtual orbitals lead to a systematic convergence of the correlation energies, but more importantly to the singlet-triplet T$_1$-S$_ 0$ energy gaps with respect to the complete active space (CAS) [occupied + virtual] size. We confirm our findings by simulating T$_1$-S$_ 0$ gaps in H$_2$O$_2$ and O$_2$ molecules using the traditional complete active space configuration interaction (CASCI) approach, as well as in stretched CH$_2$, for which we also employed the iterative qubit coupled cluster (iQCC) method as a quantum eigensolver. Finally, we applied the iQCC method with ZAPT-FNO-selected active space to the phosphorescent Ir(ppy)$_3$ complex with 260 electrons, where extended basis sets are required to achieve chemical (ca. 1 m$E_h$) accuracy. In this case, CASCI results are not available; however, the iQCC-computed T$_1$-S$_ 0$ gaps show robust convergence with enlarging basis set and CAS size, approaching the experimental value. Thus, the ZAPT-FNO method is very promising for improving the accuracy of quantum chemical modelling in a resource-efficient manner, and opens the door to simulating open-shell states of large materials within realistic active space sizes and without compromising on basis-set quality.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于ZAPT2的开壳层冻结自然轨道方法，可有效缩减虚拟轨道空间大小，在保持精度的同时提高计算效率，特别适用于大基组下的开壳层体系计算。
AI.motivation: 传统基于HF轨道能量的虚拟轨道截断方法在大基组下效果不佳，需要开发更有效的轨道选择方案来平衡计算资源与精度。
AI.method: 使用ZAPT2方法生成冻结自然轨道，通过系统选择虚拟轨道来构建活性空间，结合CASCI和iQCC方法进行验证。
AI.result: ZAPT-FNO方法能系统收敛相关能和单重态-三重态能隙，在H2O2、O2、CH2和Ir(ppy)3等体系中均表现出良好性能，计算结果与实验值接近。
AI.conclusion: ZAPT-FNO方法为大型开壳层体系的高精度量子化学模拟提供了资源高效的解决方案，可在不牺牲基组质量的前提下实现现实活性空间大小的计算。

title: Topological phase transitions by time-dependent electromagnetic fields in frustrated magnets: Role of dynamical and static magnetic fields
summary: We theoretically investigate the effects of time-dependent electromagnetic fields on frustrated magnets with the spatial inversion symmetry. Two types of external-field setups are considered: One is a circularly polarized electromagnetic field and the other is a combination of a circularly polarized electric field and a static magnetic field. The system is modeled by a classical frustrated Heisenberg model on a triangular lattice, whose ground state is a single-$Q$ spiral spin configuration. The effects of irradiated electric and magnetic fields are taken into account by the inverse Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya (DM) interaction and the Zeeman coupling, respectively, without heating effects. By numerically solving the Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert equation, we find that the two field configurations lead to distinct skyrmion crystal (SkX) phases and their associated topological phase transitions: in the former setup, SkXs composed of skyrmions with skyrmion numbers of one and two with opposite signs emerge, whereas in the latter setup, SkXs with the same sign appear. The stabilization mechanisms of these SkXs are accounted for by the competition among electromagnetic-field-induced chiral DM interactions, electric-field-induced three-spin interactions, and the Zeeman coupling based on the high-frequency expansion within the Floquet formalism. Furthermore, for the latter setup, we find that the stability region of the SkX phase varies significantly depending on the timing of the application of the circularly polarized electric field and the static magnetic field. Our findings would broaden the possible routes to generate and control SkXs by time-dependent electromagnetic fields, advancing both the theoretical comprehension and experimental control of topological spin crystals.

AI.tldr: 研究时间依赖电磁场对具有空间反演对称性的受挫磁体的影响，发现两种不同的场配置会产生不同类型的斯格明子晶体相和拓扑相变。
AI.motivation: 探索通过时间依赖电磁场生成和控制斯格明子晶体的新途径，推进对拓扑自旋晶体的理论理解和实验控制。
AI.method: 使用经典受挫海森堡模型，通过数值求解Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert方程，结合Floquet形式的高频展开分析电磁场诱导的手性DM相互作用、电场诱导的三自旋相互作用和塞曼耦合的竞争机制。
AI.result: 两种场配置产生不同的斯格明子晶体相：前者产生具有相反符号的斯格明子数1和2的斯格明子晶体，后者产生相同符号的斯格明子晶体。斯格明子晶体相的稳定区域随电场和磁场施加时序显著变化。
AI.conclusion: 时间依赖电磁场为生成和控制斯格明子晶体提供了新的可能途径，深化了对拓扑自旋晶体的理解，并为实验控制提供了理论指导。

title: Chemical-space completeness: a new strategy for crystalline materials exploration
summary: The emergence of deep learning has brought the long-standing goal of comprehensively understanding and exploring crystalline materials closer to reality. Yet, universal exploration across all elements remains hindered by the combinatorial explosion of possible chemical environments, making it difficult to balance accuracy and efficiency. Crucially, within any finite set of elements, the diversity of short-range bonding types and local geometric motifs is inherently limited. Guided by this chemical intuition, we propose a chemical-system-centric strategy for crystalline materials exploration. In this framework, generative models are coupled with machine-learned force fields as fast energy evaluators, and both are iteratively refined in a closed-loop cycle of generation, evaluation, and fine-tuning. Using the Li-P-S ternary system as a case study, we show that this approach captures the diversity of local environments with minimal additional first-principles data while maintaining structural creativity, achieving closed-loop convergence toward chemical completeness within a bounded chemical space. We further demonstrate downstream applications, including phase-diagram construction, ionic-diffusivity screening, and electronic-structure prediction. Together, this strategy provides a systematic and data-efficient framework for modeling both atomistic and electronic structures within defined chemical spaces, bridging accuracy and efficiency, and paving the way toward scalable, AI-driven discovery of crystalline materials with human-level creativity and first-principles fidelity.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种以化学系统为中心的晶体材料探索策略，结合生成模型和机器学习力场，通过生成-评估-微调的闭环循环实现数据高效的晶体材料发现。
AI.motivation: 深度学习为全面理解晶体材料带来了希望，但普遍探索仍受限于组合爆炸问题。在有限元素集合中，短程键合类型和局部几何模式的多样性本质上是有限的，这为数据高效探索提供了机会。
AI.method: 将生成模型与机器学习力场作为快速能量评估器耦合，在生成、评估和微调的闭环循环中迭代优化。以Li-P-S三元体系为案例研究，验证方法的有效性。
AI.result: 该方法以最少的第一性原理数据捕捉局部环境的多样性，保持结构创造性，在有限化学空间内实现闭环收敛。成功应用于相图构建、离子扩散性筛选和电子结构预测。
AI.conclusion: 该策略为在定义化学空间内建模原子和电子结构提供了系统化、数据高效的框架，在准确性和效率之间架起桥梁，为可扩展的AI驱动晶体材料发现铺平道路。

title: Modified Monte Carlo method with thermostat algorithm for model orthonickelates
summary: The results of numerical simulation using a modified Monte Carlo method with a thermostat algorithm for a pseudospin model of orthonickelates are presented. Temperature phase diagrams are constructed for various degrees of filling and for various parameters of the model, and the effect of local correlations on the critical temperatures of the model orthonickelate is investigated. The possibility of detecting phase inhomogeneous states is shown. The numerical simulation results show good qualitative agreement with the analytical results in the mean field approximation.

AI.tldr: 使用改进的蒙特卡洛方法和恒温器算法对正镍酸盐赝自旋模型进行数值模拟，构建了不同填充度和模型参数下的温度相图，研究了局域关联对临界温度的影响，并展示了检测相不均匀状态的可能性。
AI.motivation: 研究正镍酸盐模型中的相变行为，特别是局域关联对临界温度的影响以及相不均匀状态的存在可能性。
AI.method: 采用改进的蒙特卡洛方法结合恒温器算法进行数值模拟，分析不同填充度和模型参数下的温度相图。
AI.result: 数值模拟结果与平均场近似的解析结果在定性上具有良好的一致性，成功检测到相不均匀状态。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能有效研究正镍酸盐模型的相变特性，数值模拟与理论分析结果相符，为理解此类材料的相行为提供了有效工具。

title: Inverse determination of light-matter coupling in disordered systems from transmittance spectra
summary: We investigate quantum inverse problems in one-dimensional (1D) electronic disordered systems strongly coupled to optical cavities. More specifically, we consider the Anderson and the Aubry-Andre-Harper models connected to electronic reservoirs and embedded in a single-mode optical cavity. The light-matter interaction enables photon-assisted hopping processes that significantly modify the transmittance spectrum. Within the nonequilibrium Green's function formalism, we implement an inversion-based approach capable of accurately extracting the electron-photon coupling strength directly from transmittance spectra. While cavity coupling acts as a minor perturbation within the Anderson model, yielding broad yet precise parameter estimates, its influence is markedly different in the Aubry-André-Harper model. The latter exhibits a sharp metal-insulator transition in 1D, thus resulting in more pronounced cavity-induced spectral changes. This renders even more accurate inverse solutions, offering unparalleled precision in the characterization of low-dimensional disordered systems. Altogether, our results demonstrate that the quantum inverse problem provides a robust diagnostic tool for quantum materials, particularly effective for systems exhibiting metal-insulator transitions.

AI.tldr: 研究一维电子无序系统与光学腔强耦合下的量子逆问题，通过透射谱反演提取电子-光子耦合强度，在Aubry-André-Harper模型中表现出更高的精度。
AI.motivation: 探索量子材料中光-物质相互作用对电子输运性质的影响，特别是在无序系统中，为量子材料诊断提供新方法。
AI.method: 采用非平衡格林函数形式，在Anderson和Aubry-André-Harper模型中实现基于反演的方法，从透射谱中提取电子-光子耦合强度。
AI.result: 腔耦合在Anderson模型中作为微小扰动，产生宽泛但精确的参数估计；在Aubry-André-Harper模型中，由于存在尖锐的金属-绝缘体转变，腔诱导的光谱变化更显著，反演解精度更高。
AI.conclusion: 量子逆问题为量子材料提供了稳健的诊断工具，特别适用于具有金属-绝缘体转变的系统。

title: The (110) surface is the key to the high ice nucleation efficiency of potassium feldspar
summary: Mineral dust aerosols strongly influence Earth's climate by acting as ice-nucleating particles (INPs). Feldspar minerals, particularly K-feldspar, are recognized as dominant INPs, and a previous study attributed this behavior to (100) surfaces exposed at defects. Using machine-learning molecular dynamics simulations, we systematically investigate ice nucleation on all K-feldspar surfaces. We identify the (110) surface, exposed at defects such as steps, as the most active plane for ice formation. This surface uniquely structures interfacial water into an arrangement resembling that on the (110) surface of cubic ice, providing an optimal template for nucleation. Using advanced sampling, we directly observe the formation of clusters with cubic-ice structure and their orientation agrees with experiment. These results provide a microscopic explanation of how ice forms in our planet's atmosphere.

AI.tldr: 通过机器学习分子动力学模拟，研究发现K长石的(110)表面是最活跃的冰核形成平面，该表面能将界面水结构化成立方冰(110)表面的排列方式，为冰核形成提供最佳模板。
AI.motivation: 矿物粉尘气溶胶通过作为冰核粒子强烈影响地球气候，其中K长石被认为是主要的冰核粒子，但对其冰核形成机制的理解仍不完整。
AI.method: 使用机器学习分子动力学模拟，系统研究K长石所有表面的冰核形成过程，并采用先进采样技术直接观察立方冰结构团簇的形成。
AI.result: 发现(110)表面是最活跃的冰核形成平面，该表面能独特地将界面水结构化成立方冰(110)表面的排列方式，观察到的团簇取向与实验结果一致。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果为大气中冰形成提供了微观解释，揭示了K长石(110)表面在冰核形成中的关键作用。

title: Numerical renormalization group integrated Hamiltonian truncation: Toward generic deformation of integrable lattice models
summary: We present a hybrid lattice Hamiltonian truncation method that integrates the numerical renormalization group (NRG) with a truncated lattice integrable spectrum. The technique is tailored for generic deformations of integrable lattice models, where the NRG enables a controlled incorporation of high-energy states. The method extends the basis set more effectively and efficiently than brute-force truncation, meanwhile significantly reducing errors. We show its capability on two paradigmatic models: an Ising chain in a magnetic field and a quantum Ising ladder. The resulting dynamical structure factors accurately capture the essential low-energy physics, including the $E_8$ and $\mathcal{D}_8^{(1)}$ excitations of the former and later models, respectively, demonstrating the approach's computational efficiency and high performance.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种混合晶格哈密顿量截断方法，结合数值重整化群和截断晶格可积谱，用于处理可积晶格模型的一般变形。
AI.motivation: 针对可积晶格模型的一般变形，需要一种能有效控制高能态纳入的方法，以更高效地扩展基组并显著减少误差。
AI.method: 将数值重整化群与截断晶格可积谱相结合，通过NRG实现对高能态的可控纳入，比暴力截断方法更有效和高效。
AI.result: 在Ising链磁场模型和量子Ising梯子模型上验证了方法能力，准确捕捉了低能物理本质，包括E₈和D₈⁽¹⁾激发。
AI.conclusion: 该方法在计算效率和性能方面表现出色，能够准确描述可积变形模型的低能物理特性。

title: An Active Learning Interatomic Potential For Defect-Engineered CoCrFeMnNi High-Entropy Alloy
summary: High-entropy alloys (HEAs) exhibit exceptional properties arising from a combination of thermodynamic, kinetic and structural factors and have found applications in numerous fields such as aerospace, energy, chemical industries, hydrogen storage, and ocean engineering. However, a large compositional space remains to be explored. Unlike conventional approaches, computational methods have shown accelerated discovery of novel alloys in a short time. However, the lack of interatomic potentials have posed a challenge in discovering new alloy compositions and property measurements. In the present work, we have developed a Moment Tensor Potential (MTP) trained by Machine Learning based approach using the BFGS unconstrained optimization algorithm for the CoCrFeMnNi High-entropy alloy. Our training set consists of various defects induced configurations such as vacancies, dislocations and stacking-faults. An active learning scheme to re-train the potential was undertaken to dynamically to add training data upon encountering extrapolative configurations during non-equilibrium simulations. A thorough investigation of the error metrics, equation of state, uniaxial tensile deformation, nano-indentation and solid-liquid interface stability for this alloy was carried out, and it is seen that the MTP potential outperforms the popular Modified Embedded Atom Method (MEAM) potential on physical properties prediction. The accuracy and high computational speed are discussed using scaling performance. The potential is prepared for public use by embedding it into the Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator (LAMMPS) code.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种用于CoCrFeMnNi高熵合金的机器学习矩张量势函数，通过主动学习方案优化训练，在物理性能预测上优于传统MEAM势函数。
AI.motivation: 高熵合金具有优异性能，但传统方法难以探索广阔的成分空间。缺乏精确的原子间势函数限制了新合金成分的发现和性能测量。
AI.method: 使用BFGS无约束优化算法训练矩张量势函数，训练集包含空位、位错和堆垛层错等缺陷构型，采用主动学习方案动态添加训练数据。
AI.result: MTP势函数在状态方程、单轴拉伸变形、纳米压痕和固液界面稳定性等性能预测上优于MEAM势函数，具有高精度和计算速度。
AI.conclusion: 开发的MTP势函数成功嵌入LAMMPS代码供公开使用，为高熵合金的加速发现提供了有效的计算工具。

title: Crossover dynamics and non-Gaussian fluctuations in inertial active chains
summary: We study the dynamics of inertial active particles in a one-dimensional chain with harmonic nearest-neighbor interactions, highlighting the interplay of persistence, interaction, and inertial timescales. Using a Green's function approach, we derive the mean-squared displacement (MSD) and mean-squared change in velocity (MSCV), revealing multiple crossovers between ballistic, diffusive, and subdiffusive regimes and providing analytic expressions for scaling coefficients and crossover times. Non-Gaussian deviations in active Brownian particles are captured through excess kurtosis, reflecting heavy-tailed, finite-support, or bimodal distributions that evolve systematically over time. Time-dependent probability distributions exhibit distinct data collapses within different temporal regimes, confirming the robustness of the scaling behavior. Overall, this framework connects multiparticle interactions to microscopic dynamics, revealing experimentally accessible signatures of inertia in active matter.

AI.tldr: 研究一维谐波链中惯性活性粒子的动力学，揭示持久性、相互作用和惯性时间尺度的相互作用，通过格林函数方法分析位移和速度变化，发现多种跨区行为和非高斯偏差。
AI.motivation: 探索惯性活性粒子在多粒子相互作用下的微观动力学，连接多粒子相互作用与微观动力学，揭示活性物质中惯性的实验可观测特征。
AI.method: 使用格林函数方法推导均方位移和均方速度变化，分析非高斯偏差通过超额峰度，研究时间依赖概率分布的数据坍塌。
AI.result: 发现弹道、扩散和次扩散区域之间的多个交叉，获得标度系数和交叉时间的解析表达式，捕获非高斯偏差反映的重尾、有限支撑或双峰分布。
AI.conclusion: 该框架将多粒子相互作用与微观动力学联系起来，揭示了活性物质中惯性的实验可观测特征，确认了标度行为的稳健性。

title: Ultrafast electron diffractive imaging of the dissociation of pre-excited molecules
summary: Gas phase ultrafast electron diffraction (GUED) has become a powerful technique to directly observe the structural dynamics of photoexcited molecules. GUED reveals information about the nuclear motions that is complementary to the information on the electronic states provided by spectroscopic measurements. GUED experiments so far have utilized a single laser pulse to excite the molecules and an electron pulse to probe the dynamics. This limits the excited states which can be studied to only those that can be reached by absorption of a photon from the ground state or in some cases simultaneous absorption of multiple photons. A broader class of experiments and dynamics can be accessed using two time-delayed laser pulses to access unexplored regions of the potential energy surfaces. As a proof-of-principle experiment using a double excitation, we studied the photodissociation of trifluoroiodomethane molecules that are pre-excited with an infrared (800 nm) femtosecond laser pulse before photo-dissociation is triggered with an ultraviolet (266 nm) femtosecond laser pulse. We have observed significant differences in the dissociation dynamics, with pre-excitation resulting in a slower dissociation process. This new capability can offer new insights on the evolution of nuclear wavepackets in regions of the excited potential energy surface which are inaccessible in single photon excitation. We present a methodology to carry out the measurement, analyze and interpret the data that could be applied to a broad class of experiments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种使用双激光脉冲激发的气相超快电子衍射(GUED)新方法，通过红外和紫外飞秒激光脉冲的时序激发，研究了三氟碘甲烷的光解离动力学，发现预激发导致更慢的解离过程。
AI.motivation: 传统GUED实验使用单激光脉冲激发分子，限制了可研究的激发态范围。双脉冲激发可以探索势能面上更多无法通过单光子激发到达的区域，从而研究更广泛的实验和动力学过程。
AI.method: 采用双激光脉冲激发方法：先用800nm红外飞秒激光脉冲预激发三氟碘甲烷分子，再用266nm紫外飞秒激光脉冲触发光解离，通过电子衍射探测核动力学过程。
AI.result: 观察到显著的解离动力学差异，预激发导致更慢的解离过程，这为研究激发势能面上无法通过单光子激发到达区域的核波包演化提供了新见解。
AI.conclusion: 双激发GUED方法扩展了可研究的激发态范围，为研究核波包在激发势能面上的演化提供了新能力，该方法可应用于更广泛的实验类别。

title: Spin-orbit driven $J_{eff} = 1/2$ magnetism in a d$^7$ triangular-lattice monolayer cobaltate
summary: Recent theoretical and experimental advances have identified cobaltates with a high-spin $d^7$ electronic configuration as promising hosts for spin-orbit entangled $J_{eff} = 1/2$ magnetism that can support bond-dependent exchange interactions. In two-dimensional triangular lattices, the coexistence of such exchange frustration along with geometric frustration gives rise to a rich landscape of competing magnetic phases, establishing monolayer triangular $d^7$ cobaltates as a compelling platform for frustrated magnetism. Here we investigate a representative triangular-lattice monolayer cobaltate CoBr$_2$, where first-principles density functional theory (DFT) calculations reveal a dominant nearest-neighbor $t_{2g}$-$e_g$ hopping channel that enhances the ferromagnetic Kitaev-type exchange interactions. In contrast, the nearest-neighbor Heisenberg term is highly sensitive to a direct $t_{2g}$-$t_{2g}$ hopping path and electronic correlations. The magnetic exchange parameters are evaluated using the hopping amplitudes obtained from DFT calculations within an exact diagonalization framework. We construct the first and third nearest neighbor Heisenberg exchange dependent $J_1$-$J_3$ magnetic phase diagram in the physically relevant regime and identify multiple competing ground states, including ferromagnetic, stripy, spiral, and $120^{\circ}$ antiferromagnetic orders. The Luttinger-Tisza analysis further predicts a Z$_2$ vortex crystal phase, while exact diagonalization reveals a bond-nematic phase stabilized by the longer-range couplings. Going beyond the conventional bond-independent XXZ picture typically applied to Co$^{2+}$ systems, our results on monolayer CoBr$_2$ establish d$^7$ cobalt dihalides as a promising platform to explore the interplay of long-range Heisenberg and bond-dependent exchange interactions that can stabilize diverse magnetic ground states on a triangular lattice.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了单层CoBr₂三角晶格钴酸盐的磁性，发现其具有丰富的竞争磁相，包括铁磁、条纹、螺旋和120°反铁磁序，以及Z₂涡旋晶体相和键向列相。
AI.motivation: 高自旋d⁷电子构型的钴酸盐是研究自旋轨道纠缠J_eff=1/2磁性的理想平台，在三角晶格中结合交换阻挫和几何阻挫可以产生丰富的竞争磁相。
AI.method: 使用第一性原理密度泛函理论计算获得跳跃振幅，在精确对角化框架下评估磁交换参数，构建J₁-J₃磁相图，并进行Luttinger-Tisza分析和精确对角化计算。
AI.result: 发现最近邻t₂g-e_g跳跃通道增强了铁磁Kitaev型交换相互作用，而最近邻Heisenberg项对直接t₂g-t₂g跳跃路径和电子关联高度敏感，识别出多种竞争基态。
AI.conclusion: 单层CoBr₂确立了d⁷钴二卤化物作为探索长程Heisenberg和键依赖交换相互作用相互作用的平台，可在三角晶格上稳定多样的磁基态。

title: Distortion-Driven Carrier Decoupling in Doped LiMgPO4
summary: The interplay between lattice distortions and charge carriers governs the properties of many functional oxides. In alkali-doped LiMgPO4, a significant enhancement in dosimetric response is observed, but its microscopic origin is not understood. Using non-adiabatic molecular dynamics, we reveal a fundamental mechanism of carrier decoupling driven by a hierarchy of lattice distortions. We show that electrons localize into stable small polarons on an ultrafast timescale, trapped by the strong local potential induced by the dopant, while holes form more delocalized polarons that migrate efficiently through a lattice smoothed by global strain. The stark contrast between the dynamics of trapped electrons and mobile holes explains the suppressed recombination and enhanced energy storage. These results present a clear physical picture of how multiscale lattice distortions can independently control electron and hole transport, offering new insights into the physics of polarons in complex materials.

AI.tldr: 通过非绝热分子动力学揭示了掺杂LiMgPO4中载流子解耦的微观机制：电子在掺杂剂诱导的局域势中形成稳定小极化子，而空穴通过全局应变平滑的晶格形成更离域极化子，这种电子-空穴动力学差异解释了抑制复合和增强能量存储的原因。
AI.motivation: 理解碱金属掺杂LiMgPO4中剂量响应显著增强但微观起源未知的问题，探索晶格畸变与载流子相互作用的基本机制。
AI.method: 使用非绝热分子动力学方法，研究多尺度晶格畸变对电子和空穴传输的独立控制机制。
AI.result: 发现电子在超快时间尺度上局域化为稳定小极化子，被掺杂剂诱导的强局域势捕获；而空穴形成更离域极化子，在全局应变平滑的晶格中高效迁移。
AI.conclusion: 多尺度晶格畸变可以独立控制电子和空穴传输，为复杂材料中极化子物理提供了新见解，解释了抑制复合和增强能量存储的机制。

title: Tunneling in multi-site mesoscopic quantum Hall circuits
summary: Transport properties of the single- and two-site mesoscoipc quantum Hall (QH) circuits at high transparencies can be described in terms of the lowest-order backscattering perturbations, and mapping to the boundary sine-Gordon model can be exploited in full generality. While the higher-order backscattering processes are exactly marginal in the case of corresponding three-site circuits, they become crucial in a device with four or more sites. Here, we explore the transport properties of a multi-site QH circuit with special focus on that with four sites, and report their unique quantum critical behaviors that can be accessed via transport measurements. Tunneling phenomena in multichannel QH circuits based on multi-site geometry are also investigated, and a promising route to realizing different aspects of quantum critical phenomena is offered

AI.tldr: 本文研究了多站点量子霍尔电路中高阶背散射过程对输运性质的影响，特别关注四站点电路的量子临界行为，并探讨了多通道系统中的隧穿现象。
AI.motivation: 研究多站点量子霍尔电路中高阶背散射过程的作用，特别是在四站点或更多站点电路中这些过程变得至关重要，探索其独特的量子临界行为。
AI.method: 利用边界正弦-戈登模型映射，分析多站点量子霍尔电路的输运性质，特别关注四站点电路的高阶背散射过程。
AI.result: 发现了多站点量子霍尔电路中的独特量子临界行为，这些行为可以通过输运测量来探测，并研究了多通道系统中的隧穿现象。
AI.conclusion: 多站点量子霍尔电路为实现量子临界现象的不同方面提供了一条有前景的途径，特别是在四站点电路中观察到的独特量子临界行为。

title: Formation of HNC and HCN isomers in molecular plasmas revealed by frequency comb and quantum cascade laser spectroscopy
summary: Hydrogen cyanide (HCN) is a well-known product in combustion, astrophysical, and plasma environments, but its isomer, hydrogen isocyanide (HNC), remains unexplored in molecular plasmas. Here, we report on the detection and quantification of both HNC and HCN isomers in low-temperature plasmas generated from N$_2$/H$_2$/CH$_4$ mixtures using quantum cascade laser and frequency comb absorption spectroscopy. The identification of HNC is confirmed by comparison with molecular spectroscopic databases. The observed [HNC]/[HCN] abundance ratio of $\sim 10^{-4}$ is far lower than reported values in interstellar media, where ratios can reach unity. We attribute this stark difference to fundamentally different kinetics, dominated by an interplay between formation of vibrationally 'hot' intermediates (HCN* and HNC*) and their subsequent stabilization and destruction. This mechanism contrasts with cold interstellar environments, where dissociative recombination reactions dominate and the formed HNC persists and accumulates over astrochemical timescales. Our results highlight the overlooked role of HNC in plasma chemistry containing carbon, nitrogen and hydrogen, with implications for plasma-assisted HCN synthesis and nitrogen-carbon plasma processes in surface modification and material treatments.

AI.tldr: 首次在低温等离子体中检测并量化了HNC和HCN异构体，发现[HNC]/[HCN]丰度比约为10^-4，远低于星际介质中的比值，揭示了等离子体环境中不同的动力学机制。
AI.motivation: 氢氰酸异构体氢异氰酸在分子等离子体环境中尚未被探索，而HCN在燃烧、天体物理和等离子体环境中是已知产物。
AI.method: 使用量子级联激光器和频率梳吸收光谱技术，在N2/H2/CH4混合物生成的低温等离子体中检测和量化HNC和HCN异构体，通过与分子光谱数据库对比确认HNC的识别。
AI.result: 观察到[HNC]/[HCN]丰度比约为10^-4，远低于星际介质中可达1的比值，揭示了等离子体环境中不同的动力学机制。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果强调了HNC在含碳、氮和氢的等离子体化学中被忽视的作用，对等离子体辅助HCN合成以及表面改性和材料处理中的氮-碳等离子体过程具有重要意义。

title: Effects of the Next-Nearest-Neighbor Hopping on the Low-Dimensional Hubbard Model: Ferromagnetism, Antiferromagnetism, and Superconductivity
summary: The Hubbard model has attracted considerable interest due to its prototypical role in describing strongly interacting electronic systems, such as high-critical-temperature superconductors as well as many novel quantum materials. By introducing next-nearest-neighbor (NNN) hoppings to the Hubbard model, the phase diagram becomes richer, and fascinating phenomena arise in both, one-dimensional chains and square lattices, such as: antiferromagnetism (AFM), ferromagnetism (FM), superconductivity (SC), as well as charge orders, among others. Moreover, NNN hoppings play a fundamental role in understanding effects of doping on magnetism and pairing orders in strongly interacting regimes. In this article, we review the recent progress in understanding the different competing phases of this model in one and two dimensions from a computational perspective. We comment on the pressing technical challenges, illustrate the controversial results concerning the emergence of the SC phase, and conclude with our perspectives on future explorations.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了包含次近邻跃迁的哈伯德模型在一维和二维系统中的研究进展，重点讨论了该模型中不同竞争相的计算研究，特别是关于超导相出现的争议结果。
AI.motivation: 哈伯德模型在描述强关联电子系统（如高温超导体和新型量子材料）中具有重要作用。引入次近邻跃迁使相图更加丰富，能更好地理解掺杂对磁性和配对序的影响。
AI.method: 从计算角度综述一维和二维系统中包含次近邻跃迁的哈伯德模型研究进展，分析不同竞争相的计算结果。
AI.result: 研究发现该模型存在丰富的相行为，包括反铁磁性、铁磁性、超导性和电荷序等竞争相，但关于超导相的出现存在争议性结果。
AI.conclusion: 文章总结了当前研究进展，指出了紧迫的技术挑战，并对未来探索方向提出了展望。

title: Unraveling the Surface Stability and Chemical Reactivity of Aza-Triphenylene Monolayer under O$_2$ and H$_2$O Exposure
summary: Environmental oxidation has a great impact in tuning the physical, chemical and electronic properties of two-dimensional (2D) monolayers which can affect their practical applications in nanoscale engineering devices under ambient conditions. aza-triphenylene is a recently synthesized 2D materials whose practcal applications have not been systematically studied yet. In this study, we report for the first time, the adsorption and dissociation of O$_2$ and H$_2$O molecules on the surface of 2D aza-triphenylene monolayer through first principles calculations in combination with climbing image nudged elastic band (CINEB) method. The results indicates that both the O$_2$ and H$_2$O molecules weakly interact over the monolayer surface with an adsorption energy -0.16 eV and -0.37 eV respectively. In contrast, both the molecules exhibit resistance for dissociation due to the formation of energy barriers. The transition path indicates that molecular oxygen experience two energy barriers (0.16 ev and 1.22 eV) before getting dissociated atomic oxygen. However, the dissociation of H$_2$O requires larger energy barrier (2.3 eV and 0.86 eV) due to breaking of covalent bonds and transfer of hydrogen. The strong chemical adsorption of atomic oxygen and H$^+$/OH$^-$ ions is due to the significant charge transfer from monolayer to the adsorbate as evidenced from the charge density difference and Bader charge analysis. Moreover, the dissociated configuration exhibit a larger band gap as compared to the pristine aza-triphenylene due to the strong hybridization between the p states of carbon and oxygen. our work predicts the robustness of azatriphylene monolayer against oxygen/water exposer thus ensuring their stability for device applications using these materials.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过第一性原理计算和CINEB方法，首次系统地研究了O₂和H₂O分子在二维aza-triphenylene单层表面的吸附和解离行为，发现该材料对氧气和水暴露具有良好稳定性。
AI.motivation: 环境氧化对二维单层材料的物理、化学和电子性质有重要影响，aza-triphenylene作为一种新合成的二维材料，其在实际应用中的稳定性尚未被系统研究。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理计算结合爬坡像微动弹性带(CINEB)方法，研究O₂和H₂O分子在aza-triphenylene单层表面的吸附能和解离能垒。
AI.result: O₂和H₂O分子在单层表面均为弱吸附（吸附能分别为-0.16 eV和-0.37 eV），但解离需要克服较高能垒（O₂为0.16 eV和1.22 eV，H₂O为2.3 eV和0.86 eV）。解离后的原子态氧和离子态吸附更强，且导致带隙增大。
AI.conclusion: aza-triphenylene单层对氧气和水暴露具有良好稳定性，确保了其在纳米器件应用中的可靠性。

title: Signatures of magnetism in zigzag graphene nanoribbon embedded in h-BN lattice
summary: Zigzag edges of graphene have long been predicted to exhibit magnetic electronic state near the Fermi level, which can cause spin-related phenomena and offer unique potentials for graphene-based spintronics. However, the magnetic conduction channels along these edges have yet been reported experimentally. Here, we report the observation on signatures of magnetism in zigzag graphene nanoribbons (zGNRs) embedded in hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN). The in-plane bonding with BN can stabilize the edges of zGNRs, and thus enable a direct probing of the intrinsic magnetism. Firstly, the presence of magnetism of a zGNR was confirmed by scanning NV center microscopy. And then, zGNR was fabricated into a transistor with a width of ~9 nm wide and a channel length of sub-50 nm. By performing magneto-transport measurements, Fabry-Pérot interference patterns were observed in the transistor at 4 Kelvin, which indicates a coherent transport through the channel. A large magnetoresistance of ~175 Ω, corresponding to a ratio of ~1.3 %, was observed at the same temperature. More importantly, such magneto-transport signal is highly anisotropic on the magnetic field direction, and its appearance extends well above room temperature. All these evidences corroborate the existence of robust magnetic ordering in the edge state of zGNR. The findings on zGNR embedded in h-BN provide an effective platform for the future exploration of graphene-based spintronic devices.

AI.tldr: 在六方氮化硼中嵌入的锯齿形石墨烯纳米带表现出磁性边缘态，通过扫描NV中心显微镜和磁输运测量证实了其内在磁性，磁阻信号具有高度各向异性且可延伸到室温以上。
AI.motivation: 石墨烯的锯齿形边缘理论上具有磁性电子态，可能实现自旋相关现象和石墨烯基自旋电子学应用，但实验上一直未观察到沿这些边缘的磁性传导通道。
AI.method: 将锯齿形石墨烯纳米带嵌入六方氮化硼中稳定边缘，通过扫描NV中心显微镜确认磁性，然后制备成晶体管进行磁输运测量，观察法布里-珀罗干涉图案和磁阻效应。
AI.result: 观察到~175 Ω的大磁阻（比率~1.3%），磁输运信号对磁场方向高度各向异性，且信号可延伸到室温以上，证实了zGNR边缘态中存在稳健的磁有序。
AI.conclusion: 在h-BN中嵌入的zGNR为未来探索石墨烯基自旋电子器件提供了有效平台。

title: Electron Correlation by Exchange Mapping in Electronic Structure Calculations
summary: A method for increasing the accuracy of configuration interaction (CI) calculations of molecules and other electronic systems is proposed. The energy defect of a given calculation is associated with the electron pair origin of configurations not yet generated and this defect is mapped onto the exchange interaction for the corresponding pair of spatial molecular orbitals. The orbitals can be of opposite spin and thus the contribution includes the self-energy and differs from fermion exchange due to antisymmetry. A single parameter multiplying the exchange integral, is determined from the exact thermodynamic energy of a few reference molecules. The value of the parameter depends on the basis and level of configuration interaction but is the same for all molecules. Calculated energies are compared with experimental thermodynamic data for a set of forty mainly organic molecules representing a wide range of bonding environments. Results are reported for two types of multi- reference CI calculations: 1) a triple-zeta basis plus d-type functions for C, N, O and F and an s, p basis for H, and 2) a severely truncated virtual space in which higher spherical harmonic basis functions are removed. The error of the initial CI calculations is large, however, including the exchange-based contribution brings calculated CI energies into much closer agreement with exact values.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种提高分子构型相互作用(CI)计算精度的方法，通过将能量缺陷与未生成构型的电子对起源关联，并将其映射到相应分子轨道对的交换相互作用上。
AI.motivation: 提高构型相互作用(CI)计算分子和其他电子系统的准确性，解决现有CI计算误差较大的问题。
AI.method: 将能量缺陷与未生成构型的电子对起源关联，映射到分子轨道对的交换相互作用上。使用单个参数乘以交换积分，该参数通过参考分子的精确热力学能量确定。
AI.result: 初始CI计算误差较大，但包含基于交换的贡献后，计算得到的CI能量与精确值更加接近。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能显著提高CI计算的准确性，使计算结果更接近实验热力学数据。

title: Lieb-Schultz-Mattis-Type and Laughlin-Type Argument for the Quantum Hall Effect in Lattice Fermions with Spiral Boundary Conditions
summary: We derive the condition for the occurrence of the quantum Hall effect in two-dimensional lattice systems, expressed as $φν-ρ\in\mathbb{Z}$, where $φ$, $ν$, and $ρ$ denote the magnetic flux, the Chern number, and the electron density, respectively. By employing spiral boundary conditions, which treat the system as an extended one-dimensional chain, this condition is obtained directly through a Lieb-Schultz-Mattis-type and Laughlin-type argument. This approach improves upon the preceding work based on conventional periodic boundary conditions, where the condition was derived indirectly containing redundant system-size dependence. The key to this approach is that the spatial directions of the external force and the response can be manipulated by a factor of the system size.

AI.tldr: 该论文推导了二维晶格系统中量子霍尔效应发生的条件：φν-ρ∈ℤ，其中φ、ν和ρ分别表示磁通量、陈数和电子密度。通过使用螺旋边界条件，将系统视为扩展的一维链，直接获得了这一条件。
AI.motivation: 改进先前基于传统周期性边界条件的工作，其中推导的条件间接包含冗余的系统尺寸依赖性。螺旋边界条件能够更直接地获得量子霍尔效应的发生条件。
AI.method: 采用螺旋边界条件，将二维系统视为扩展的一维链，通过Lieb-Schultz-Mattis型和Laughlin型论证推导条件。关键是通过系统尺寸因子操纵外力和响应的空间方向。
AI.result: 成功推导出量子霍尔效应在二维晶格系统中的发生条件：φν-ρ∈ℤ，消除了先前工作中存在的系统尺寸依赖性。
AI.conclusion: 螺旋边界条件方法比传统周期性边界条件更直接有效，能够清晰地推导出量子霍尔效应的发生条件，避免了冗余的系统尺寸依赖性。

title: Lattice Thermal Transport Beyond the Quasiparticle Approximation: Nontrivial Spectral Competition between Three- and Four-Phonon Interactions
summary: The breakdown of the quasiparticle approximation (QPA) for phonons in strongly anharmonic materials necessitates advanced first-principles frameworks for accurate lattice dynamics and thermal transport predictions. We develop a comprehensive beyond-quasiparticle approximation (BQPA) approach incorporating both three- (3ph) and four-phonon (4ph) interactions and apply it to investigate lattice thermal conductivity ($κ_{\rm L}$) in MgO, PbTe, and AgCl -- materials that span a broad spectrum of anharmonicity, from weak to severe anharmonic regimes with overdamped phonons. We reveal that while BQPA consistently increases $κ_{\rm L}$ relative to QPA due to phonon softening when considering only 3ph interactions, the inclusion of additional 4ph interactions hardens the phonon spectrum and suppresses this enhancement, bringing BQPA and QPA predictions into close agreement via subtle spectral competition effects across all three compounds. These findings highlight that accurate modeling of $κ_{\rm L}$ in strongly anharmonic materials requires treating both full phonon spectral function and higher-order anharmonicity on equal footing. Our work establishes a systematic framework for modeling thermal transport in systems with overdamped phonons and provides critical insights for materials design beyond the limits of conventional phonon transport theory.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了超越准粒子近似(BQPA)方法，结合三声子和四声子相互作用，研究了MgO、PbTe和AgCl在不同非简谐程度下的晶格热导率。发现BQPA在仅考虑三声子相互作用时会增加热导率，但加入四声子相互作用后会抑制这种增强，使BQPA和QPA预测结果趋于一致。
AI.motivation: 强非简谐材料中声子准粒子近似(QPA)失效，需要开发更精确的第一性原理框架来预测晶格动力学和热输运性质。
AI.method: 开发了超越准粒子近似(BQPA)方法，同时考虑三声子和四声子相互作用，应用于MgO、PbTe和AgCl三种不同非简谐程度的材料。
AI.result: BQPA在仅考虑三声子相互作用时因声子软化而增加热导率，但加入四声子相互作用后声子谱硬化，抑制了这种增强，使BQPA和QPA预测结果接近。
AI.conclusion: 强非简谐材料中准确建模热导率需要同时处理完整的声子谱函数和高阶非简谐性，为超出传统声子输运理论极限的材料设计提供了关键见解。

title: Numerical investigation of electrostatically confined excitons in monolayer $\text{MoSe}_2$
summary: We investigate exciton confinement to a quantum wire in monolayer $\text{MoSe}_2$ where the confinement is achieved by a p-i-n junction. We employ an effective-mass exciton model and solve the problem numerically, reflecting device geometries found in experimental state-of-the-art set up. Our method allows us to investigate the entire spectrum of confined states. We show the emergence of quantum confinement and study the dependence of the confined states as a function of electrical gate voltages, which are experimentally tunable parameters. We find that the confined states can be divided into bright and dark states with the dark states having small but finite oscillator strengths. Their oscillator strengths are low enough that they have not yet been detected in experiments, whereas the spectrum of the bright exciton states reproduces recent experimental measurements. Our results provide insight into the theoretical background of confined exciton states beyond the ground state and pave the way for the development of new confinement schemes as well as avenues to access the previously not detected dark states.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过p-i-n结在单层MoSe2中实现激子量子线约束，采用有效质量激子模型数值求解，揭示了整个约束态谱系，包括实验未探测到的暗态。
AI.motivation: 研究激子在量子线中的约束行为，理解超越基态的约束激子态理论背景，为开发新的约束方案和探测暗态提供理论基础。
AI.method: 使用有效质量激子模型进行数值求解，模拟实验装置几何结构，分析电栅极电压对约束态的影响。
AI.result: 发现约束态可分为亮态和暗态，暗态具有微小但有限的振荡强度，亮态谱与实验测量结果一致，暗态因振荡强度过低尚未被实验探测。
AI.conclusion: 研究为理解约束激子态提供了理论背景，为开发新的约束方案和探测暗态开辟了途径。

title: Quantum complexity across thermal phase transition in the transverse field Ising chain with long-range couplings
summary: We investigate the behavior of the Schmidt gap, the von Neumann entanglement entropy, and the non-stabiliserness in proximity to the classical phase transition of the one-dimensional long-range transverse-field Ising model (LRTFIM). Leveraging the time-dependent variational principle (TDVP) within a tensor-network formulation, we simulate thermal states through their purified tensor-network representations. Our results show that these observables, typically regarded as hallmarks of quantum criticality, exhibit pronounced and coherent signatures even at a classical thermal transition, highlighting the emergence of quantum complexity as the system nears thermal criticality.

AI.tldr: 研究长程横向场伊辛模型在经典相变附近的施密特间隙、冯诺依曼纠缠熵和非稳定性的行为，发现这些量子临界性标志在经典热相变中也表现出显著特征。
AI.motivation: 探索通常被视为量子临界性标志的物理量在经典热相变中的行为，研究量子复杂性在接近热临界性时的涌现。
AI.method: 使用张量网络框架中的时间依赖变分原理，通过纯化张量网络表示模拟热态。
AI.result: 施密特间隙、冯诺依曼纠缠熵和非稳定性在经典热相变附近表现出显著且相干的特征。
AI.conclusion: 这些量子临界性标志在经典热相变中也能表现出显著特征，表明系统接近热临界性时会出现量子复杂性。

title: XPS Analysis of Surface Chemical Transformations in ZBLAN Glass under Thermal and Vibrational Stimuli
summary: ZBLAN glass is highly sensitive to thermal and mechanical stimuli, yet the associated surface chemical changes remain poorly understood. X-Ray Photoelectron Spectroscopy (XPS) measurements were performed on multiple ZBLAN samples representing distinct structural states: fully amorphous, incipiently crystalline, and highly crystalline, produced through thermal treatments at 250C and 350C and vibration-assisted processing at 400C under low (L2) and high (H5) vibration levels. High-resolution F 1s, Zr 3d, Hf 4f, Ba 3d, La 3d, and Na 1s spectra show progressive peak sharpening and intensity enhancement with increasing temperature and vibration, indicating reduced surface disorder and greater local structural ordering. The most pronounced changes occur under high vibration at 400C. No binding-energy shifts were detected, confirming that all elements retain their expected oxidation states and that the observed evolution reflects structural rather than chemical changes. These results provide direct evidence that thermomechanical input enhances surface ordering in ZBLAN and clarify its role in crystallization behavior relevant to infrared optical applications.

AI.tldr: 通过XPS分析发现，热机械处理能增强ZBLAN玻璃的表面有序性，促进结晶过程，但不改变元素的化学氧化态。
AI.motivation: ZBLAN玻璃对热和机械刺激高度敏感，但其表面化学变化机制尚不清楚，需要研究不同结构状态下的表面化学特性。
AI.method: 使用X射线光电子能谱(XPS)分析不同热机械处理条件下（250°C、350°C热处理，400°C低/高振动处理）的ZBLAN样品，包括完全非晶态、初始结晶态和高度结晶态。
AI.result: 随着温度和振动增加，F 1s、Zr 3d、Hf 4f、Ba 3d、La 3d和Na 1s谱峰逐渐变窄且强度增强，表明表面无序度降低，局部结构有序性提高。400°C高振动条件下变化最显著，但未检测到结合能位移。
AI.conclusion: 热机械输入能增强ZBLAN的表面有序性，这种结构变化而非化学变化主导了结晶行为，对红外光学应用具有重要意义。

title: Nontrivial flat bands and quantum Hall crossovers in square-octagon lattice materials
summary: Coexistence of nontrivial topology and flat electronic bands in low-energy lattices provides a fertile platform for correlated quantum states. The square-octagon lattice hosts Dirac nodes and flat bands at half-filling, yet the influence of intrinsic spin-orbit coupling (SOC) and staggered magnetic flux on its topological and flat-band properties remains largely unexplored. Here, we examine this lattice using tight-binding models that include SOC and magnetic flux, uncovering a quantum spin Hall phase with spin Chern number $C_s=1$, crossovers to quantum anomalous Hall phases with $C=1$ and $C=2$, and higher-order topological insulator phases carrying quantized quadrupolar corner charges. The initially dispersionless flat bands evolve into quasi-flat, topologically nontrivial bands with uniform quantum geometry and large flatness ratios, conducive to fractional Chern insulator states. We further identify realistic material candidates, including octagraphene, transition-metal dichalcogenides, synthetic $\mathrm{MoSi_2N_4}$, and magnetic $α$-MnO$_2$, as potential candidates for realizing tunable topological phases intertwined with flat-band physics, opening new opportunities for correlated topological matter.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了方形-八边形晶格中SOC和磁通量对拓扑和平带性质的影响，发现了量子自旋霍尔相、量子反常霍尔相和高阶拓扑绝缘体相，并识别了可实现这些拓扑相的材料候选物。
AI.motivation: 探索方形-八边形晶格中非平凡拓扑和平带电子能带的共存，以及SOC和交错磁通量对其拓扑和平带性质的影响，为相关拓扑物质提供新平台。
AI.method: 使用包含SOC和磁通量的紧束缚模型分析方形-八边形晶格，研究其拓扑相变和平带演化。
AI.result: 发现了量子自旋霍尔相（自旋陈数Cs=1）、量子反常霍尔相（陈数C=1和C=2）、高阶拓扑绝缘体相（量子化四极角电荷），初始平带演化为具有均匀量子几何和大平坦度比的准平拓扑非平凡能带。
AI.conclusion: 识别了octagraphene、过渡金属二硫化物、合成MoSi2N4和磁性α-MnO2等材料作为实现可调拓扑相与平带物理交织的潜在候选物，为相关拓扑物质开辟了新机遇。

title: Revealing the dynamic responses of Pb under shock loading based on DFT-accuracy machine learning potential
summary: Lead (Pb) is a typical low-melting-point ductile metal and serves as an important model material in the study of dynamic responses. Under shock-wave loading, its dynamic mechanical behavior comprises two key phenomena: plastic deformation and shock induced phase transitions. The underlying mechanisms of these processes are still poorly understood. Revealing these mechanisms remains challenging for experimental approaches. Non-equilibrium molecular dynamics (NEMD) simulations are an alternative theoretical tool for studying dynamic responses, as they capture atomic-scale mechanisms such as defect evolution and deformation pathways. However, due to the limited accuracy of empirical interatomic potentials, the reliability of previous NEMD studies is questioned. Using our newly developed machine learning potential for Pb-Sn alloys, we revisited the microstructure evolution in response to shock loading under various shock orientations. The results reveal that shock loading along the [001] orientation of Pb exhibits a fast, reversible, and massive phase transition and stacking fault evolution. The behavior of Pb differs from previous studies by the absence of twinning during plastic deformation. Loading along the [011] orientation leads to slow, irreversible plastic deformation, and a localized FCC-BCC phase transition in the Pitsch orientation relationship. This study provides crucial theoretical insights into the dynamic mechanical response of Pb, offering a theoretical input for understanding the microstructure-performance relationship under extreme conditions.

AI.tldr: 使用机器学习势函数重新研究铅在冲击载荷下的微观结构演化，发现不同冲击方向导致不同的相变和塑性变形行为。
AI.motivation: 铅作为典型低熔点延性金属，其冲击载荷下的动态力学行为（塑性变形和冲击诱导相变）机制尚不清楚，实验方法难以揭示原子尺度机制，而传统分子动力学模拟因经验势函数精度有限而可靠性受质疑。
AI.method: 使用新开发的铅锡合金机器学习势函数，通过非平衡分子动力学模拟研究不同冲击方向下的微观结构演化。
AI.result: [001]方向冲击显示快速、可逆的大规模相变和堆垛层错演化，无孪晶；[011]方向冲击导致缓慢、不可逆的塑性变形和局部FCC-BCC相变（Pitsch取向关系）。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解铅在极端条件下的动态力学响应提供了关键理论见解，为理解微观结构-性能关系提供了理论输入。

title: Spin Accumulation based deep MOKE Microscopy
summary: Magnetic imaging techniques are widespread critical tools used in fields such as magnetism, spintronics or even superconductivity. Among them, one of the most versatile methods is the magneto-optical Kerr effect. However, as soon as light is blocked from interacting with the magnetic layer, such as in deeply buried layers, optical techniques become ineffective. In this work, we present a spin-accumulation based magneto-optical Kerr effect (SA-MOKE) microscopy technique that enables imaging of a magnetic thin-films covered by thick and opaque metallic layers. The technique is based on the generation and detection of transient spin-accumulations that propagate through the thick metallic layer. These spin-accumulation signals are directly triggered and detected optically on the same side, lifting any substrate transparency requirements. The spin-accumulation signals detected on a Cu layer decay with a characteristic length of 60 nm, much longer than the 12 nm optical penetration depth, allowing for detection of magnetic contrast with Cu capping layers up to hundreds of nm. This method should enable magnetic imaging in a wide-range of experiments where the surface of interest is covered by electrodes.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于自旋积累的磁光克尔效应显微镜技术，能够对覆盖厚金属层的磁性薄膜进行成像，突破了传统光学方法在深层磁性层成像中的限制。
AI.motivation: 传统磁光克尔效应技术无法对深埋或被厚金属层覆盖的磁性层进行成像，限制了在需要电极覆盖等实验条件下的磁性成像应用。
AI.method: 利用瞬态自旋积累的产生和检测，通过厚金属层传播自旋信号，在同一侧进行光学触发和检测，无需透明衬底。
AI.result: 在铜层上检测到的自旋积累信号衰减特征长度为60nm，远大于12nm的光学穿透深度，可在数百纳米厚的铜覆盖层下检测磁性对比度。
AI.conclusion: 该技术为表面被电极覆盖的广泛实验场景中的磁性成像提供了有效解决方案。

title: Accelerated Prediction of Temperature-Dependent Lattice Thermal Conductivity via Ensembled Machine Learning Models
summary: Lattice thermal conductivity ($κ_L$) is a key physical property governing heat transport in solids, with direct relevance to thermoelectrics, thermal barrier coatings, and heat management applications. However, while experimental determination of $κ_L$ is challenging, its theoretical calculation via ab initio methods particularly using density functional theory (DFT) is computationally intensive, often more demanding than electronic transport calculations by an order of magnitude. In this work, we present a machine learning (ML) approach to predict $κ_L$ with DFT-level accuracy over a wide temperature range (100-1000 K). Among various models trained on DFT-calculated data \textcolor{black}{obtained} from literature, the Extra Trees Regressor (ETR) yielded the best performance on log-scaled $κ_L$, achieving an average $R^2$ of 0.9994 and a root mean square error (RMSE) of 0.0466 $W\,m^{-1}\,K^{-1}$. The ETR model also generalized well to twelve previously unseen (randomly chosen) low and high $κ_L$ compounds with diverse space group symmetries, reaching an $R^2$ of 0.961 against DFT benchmarks. Notably, the model excels in predicting $κ_L$ for both low- and high-symmetry compounds, enabling efficient high-throughput screening. We also demonstrate this capability by screening ultralow and ultrahigh $κ_L$ candidates among 960 half-Heusler \textcolor{black}{compounds} and 60,000 ICSD compounds from the AFLOW database. This result shows reliability of model developed for screening of potential thermoelectric materials. At the end, we have tested model's prediction ability on systems that have experimental $κ_L$ available that shows model's ability to search material that has desirable experimental $κ_L$ for thermoelectric applications.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于机器学习的方法，使用Extra Trees Regressor模型预测晶格热导率，在100-1000K温度范围内达到DFT级别的精度，可用于高通量筛选热电材料。
AI.motivation: 实验测定晶格热导率具有挑战性，而基于DFT的理论计算计算成本高昂，比电子输运计算高一个数量级，因此需要开发更高效准确的预测方法。
AI.method: 使用从文献中获取的DFT计算数据训练多种机器学习模型，其中Extra Trees Regressor在log缩放的晶格热导率上表现最佳。
AI.result: ETR模型在训练集上平均R²达到0.9994，RMSE为0.0466 W·m⁻¹·K⁻¹；在12个未见化合物上R²达到0.961，能够准确预测低对称性和高对称性化合物的热导率。
AI.conclusion: 该机器学习模型能够可靠地筛选潜在热电材料，成功应用于960个half-Heusler化合物和60,000个ICSD化合物的高通量筛选，并验证了与实验值的匹配能力。

title: Variationally Consistent Framework for Finite-Strain Microelasticity
summary: Modeling microstructural evolution at large strains requires mechanical formulations that remain thermodynamically consistent while capturing significant lattice rotations and transformation-induced stresses. However, most existing finite-strain microelasticity and phase-field approaches apply macroscopic boundary conditions heuristically, preventing proper stress relaxation and violating the Hill-Mandel work equivalence required for homogenization. These limitations can misrepresent stress states and transformation pathways under finite strains. Here a variationally consistent finite-strain microelasticity framework is presented that couples microscopic and macroscopic mechanical equilibrium through a single energy functional. The resulting Euler-Lagrange conditions, periodic micro-equilibrium and macroscopic stress balance, are solved using a staggered FFT-Newton algorithm that combines a spectral fixed-point update for local fields with a Newton step for the homogenized deformation gradient. The formulation accommodates general hyperelastic constitutive laws and arbitrary transformation gradients. Benchmarks demonstrate accurate recovery of small-strain Eshelby solutions and systematic nonlinear deviations at large dilatations. Applied to deformation twinning in magnesium, the framework reproduces lenticular morphology, stress redistribution, and faster lateral growth consistent with experiments. This approach establishes a rigorous and scalable foundation for finite-strain phase-field simulations of coherent transformations under general stress or mixed boundary conditions.

AI.tldr: 提出了一个变分一致的有限应变微弹性框架，通过单一能量泛函耦合微观和宏观力学平衡，解决了现有方法在有限应变下违反Hill-Mandel功等价和应力松弛的问题。
AI.motivation: 现有有限应变微弹性和相场方法在应用宏观边界条件时存在启发式处理，无法实现适当的应力松弛，违反了均质化所需的Hill-Mandel功等价，可能导致应力状态和转变路径的错误表征。
AI.method: 开发了变分一致的有限应变微弹性框架，通过单一能量泛函耦合微观和宏观力学平衡，使用交错FFT-牛顿算法求解欧拉-拉格朗日条件（周期性微观平衡和宏观应力平衡）。
AI.result: 基准测试准确恢复了小应变Eshelby解，并在大膨胀时显示出系统性非线性偏差。应用于镁的变形孪晶，再现了透镜状形态、应力重分布和与实验一致的快速横向生长。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为一般应力或混合边界条件下相干转变的有限应变相场模拟建立了严格且可扩展的基础。

title: A High-Efficiency Three-Stroke Quantum Isochoric Heat Engine: From Infinite Potential Wells to Magic Angle Twisted Bilayer Graphene
summary: We introduce a three-stroke quantum isochoric cycle that functions as a heat engine operating between two thermal reservoirs. Implemented for a particle confined in a one-dimensional infinite potential well, the cycle's performance is benchmarked against the classical three-stroke triangular and isochoric engines. We find that the quantum isochoric cycle achieves a higher efficiency than both classical counterparts and also surpasses the efficiency of the recently proposed three-stroke quantum isoenergetic cycle. Owing to its reduced number of strokes, the design substantially lowers control complexity in nanoscale thermodynamic devices, offering a more feasible route to experimental realization compared to conventional four-stroke architectures. We further evaluate the cycle in graphene-based systems under an external magnetic field, including monolayer graphene (MLG), AB-stacked bilayer graphene (BLG), and twisted bilayer graphene (TBG) at both magic and non-magic twist angles. Among these platforms, magic-angle twisted bilayer graphene (MATBG) attains the highest efficiency at fixed work output, highlighting its promise for quantum thermodynamic applications.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种三冲程量子等容循环热机，在量子系统中比经典三冲程热机和量子等能循环效率更高，且控制复杂度更低，特别在魔角扭转双层石墨烯中表现最佳。
AI.motivation: 开发更简单高效的量子热机，减少传统四冲程结构的控制复杂性，为纳米尺度热力学设备提供更可行的实验实现路径。
AI.method: 使用一维无限势阱中的粒子实现三冲程量子等容循环，并与经典三冲程三角形和等容发动机以及量子等能循环进行性能对比。
AI.result: 量子等容循环效率高于所有对比系统，魔角扭转双层石墨烯在固定功输出下达到最高效率。
AI.conclusion: 三冲程量子等容循环为量子热力学应用提供了高效且实验可行的方案，魔角扭转双层石墨烯是最有前景的平台。

title: Local indirect magnetoelectric coupling at twin walls in CaMnO$_3$
summary: Ferroelastic twin walls in centrosymmetric perovskites can host emergent polar and magnetic properties forbidden in the bulk. We use density functional theory calculations to study the geometry and magnetic properties of ferroelastic domain walls in orthorhombic CaMnO$_3$, which belongs to the most common perovskite space group, $Pnma$. At the wall, the inherent inversion symmetry-breaking induces local polar distortions dependent on the wall geometry, which couple to the magnetic order through the octahedral distortions. Noncollinear calculations reveal enhanced out-of-plane magnetic moments on the Mn atoms and a local, finite magnetization confined to the wall. Strain fields across twin walls thus give rise to coexistence of polarization and magnetization as well as magnetoelectric response that is absent and symmetry-forbidden in bulk CaMnO$_3$. We propose that magnetoelectric coupling and coexisting polarization and magnetization can emerge at twin walls in bulk centrosymmetric antiferromagnets.

AI.tldr: 通过密度泛函理论计算，研究了CaMnO₃铁弹性孪晶壁的几何和磁性质，发现在孪晶壁处由于对称性破缺会产生局域极化和磁化，这些性质在体材料中是被对称性禁止的。
AI.motivation: 研究中心对称钙钛矿中铁弹性孪晶壁能否产生体材料中对称性禁止的极性和磁性性质，探索在反铁磁体中实现磁电耦合的可能性。
AI.method: 使用密度泛函理论计算，分析正交晶系CaMnO₃中铁弹性畴壁的几何结构和磁性质，包括非共线磁计算。
AI.result: 在孪晶壁处观察到局域极性畸变、增强的Mn原子面外磁矩、局域有限磁化，以及体材料中不存在的极化和磁化共存现象。
AI.conclusion: 应变场通过孪晶壁可以在体中心对称反铁磁体中产生磁电耦合和极性与磁化共存，为设计新型功能材料提供了途径。

title: First Principles study of Photocatalytic Water Splitting in BO Monolayer: Effect of Strain and Surface Functionalization
summary: Light element based two dimensional (2D) materials are promising photocatalysts for hydrogen production via water splitting. Boron oxide (BO) is a recently synthesized 2D monolayer which has yet to be thoroughly explored for its potential applications. In this article, using first principles calculations, we report, for the first time, the visible-light photocatalytic activity of a BO monolayer for water splitting under mechanical strain and surface modification with single- and double-atom decorations (C, N, Si, Ge, P, As). The pristine BO monolayer exhibits an indirect band gap of 3.8 eV with band edges spanning the water redox potentials, but its optical absorption lies in the UV region (~ 4.5 eV). Strain engineering tunes the band gap and band alignment with a minimal shifting in the optical absorption (~0.5 eV). Single atom decoration produces a metallic state for elements like N, P, As, and an insulating state for single C, Si, Ge with a partial shifting in optical absorption. In contrast, double atom decoration produces substantial band gap reduction, improved band alignment, a pronounced red-shift in optical absorption into the visible range (1.6 to 3.2 eV) thus satisfying the criteria for water splitting. The stability of all the adsorbed configurations was confirmed by negative formation energy and ab-initio molecular dynamics simulations. These findings suggest BO monolayer functionalization can improve photocatalytic efficiency, providing hydrogen generation insights.

AI.tldr: 通过应变工程和表面修饰（单原子和双原子装饰），BO单层的光催化性能得到显著改善，特别是双原子装饰能够将光吸收红移至可见光范围，满足水分解制氢的要求。
AI.motivation: 探索轻元素二维材料在光催化水分解制氢中的应用潜力，特别是研究BO单层在应变和表面修饰下的光催化性能。
AI.method: 使用第一性原理计算，研究BO单层在机械应变和表面修饰（C、N、Si、Ge、P、As单原子和双原子装饰）下的电子结构、能带排列和光学吸收特性。
AI.result: 原始BO单层具有3.8 eV的间接带隙，光吸收在紫外区域。双原子装饰显著减小带隙，改善能带排列，并将光吸收红移至可见光范围（1.6-3.2 eV）。所有吸附构型均具有负形成能且通过分子动力学模拟验证稳定性。
AI.conclusion: BO单层功能化能够有效提高光催化效率，为氢能生产提供了新的见解和可能性。
